item.title: Creating New Blog Flow
item.description: I want to explain few random posts on Twitter and LinkedIn, I created new blog, publishing workflow and my “microblog” posts get automagically posted to Twitter and LinkedIn. Homepage is at https://softwaredevelopmentinchicago.com/ and so far I am happy that I can write and post about things I care about and it will be shared everywhere that is relevant.

item.title: 2019-12-09T10:09:26-06:00
item.description: I just want to point out, that while this chill deep house theme was playing, I was able to setup a new blog, configure everything, explore different kind of posts, shortcodes, tie it to be published on Netlify, connect it to Micro.blog, tie crossposting to Twitter and while it is still playing, waiting for posts to show up on Twitter. Cool.
